name: AX2012ReportDeploy
description: Deploys the reports of an AX 2012 environment
author: SDK4NET.de

inputs.name: configurationFileName
inputs.label: Client config file path (.axc)
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path to the client configuration file.

inputs.name: reportName
inputs.label: Report name(s)
inputs.helpMarkDown: A comma-seperated list of reports to deploy. (If empty, all reports will be deployed.)

inputs.name: modifiedAfter
inputs.label: Modified after
inputs.helpMarkDown: Limits the reports to be deployed to those modified after a specified date. (optional)

inputs.name: restartReportServer
inputs.label: Restart report server
inputs.helpMarkDown: Forces the Reporting Services service to restart after a report is deployed.

inputs.name: skipDeletingExistingReport
inputs.label: Skip deleting existing reports
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies that the cmdlet should not delete existing report design metadata when executed.

inputs.name: skipReportServerAdminCheck
inputs.label: Skip report server admin check
inputs.helpMarkDown: Specifies that the cmdlet should be executed without checking whether the user has administrator rights on Reporting Services.
